original_body_lines: Taking into consideration the proposal presented by the Minister of Industries, the Cabinet of Ministers granted approval to hold the inaugural Industrial Exhibition Week from 22nd to 25th June 2023.
The exhibition is to be held annually here after with the aim of promoting, encouraging and uplifting local industries as well as attracting foreign investors and industrialists.
